name: A Dreamer Handbook 06
description:
A Dreamer Handbook


While I was driving South from Baltimore to Charlotte, and back. I listened to Overgound Railroad: The Green Book. My wife took a photo of my angel on my dashboard, and she drew a doorway while we hung out with my sister and my Dad. 



We started our NFT journey on OpenSea. We had our first sales and we found a community making beautiful digital art  on Tezos. We found collectors who loved my wife’s paintings remixed and re-interpreted, my stories to images in Gan art. We added hand drawings and layers. The community has a story weaved into the fabric of what we are creating everyday. 



If all of our  methods come together on this canvas, today, I am less interested in my story, and more of what the viewers see. How our blueprints and roadmaps help others on their own journey into the metaverse, through their own past and future. This mashup evolves my/our artful techniques of creating mixed media visuals with hand drawing and vintage text and imagery. The full sized original is on Open Sea.  6 pieces are scattered on Tezos. 



Here are the images and text in my search, all inspiration to create The Dreamer Handbook.



Green Book

Baltimore redlining maps

Vintage cadillac

Black Nativity

Mt. Sinai

Plantation

Rearview mirror

Winding roads

Car radio dashboard

Black hands

Steering wheel

Underground railroad

Mason Dixon

Segregation signs

Universe

Integration signs

Apartheid signs

Nazi Germany signs

Moon

No Vacancy signs

Metaverse hotel


900x414 300 DPI


NFT owner has the right to resell the NFT and to publicly display the art. Owner may not reproduce, prepare derivatives, or distribute copies without the consent of the creator.
